title: What is your opinion about the reservation system in education and jobs? - Quora

response.answer_text: With globalisation reservation is compelling meritorious to leave d country with no future to themselves&their children It has already reduced d good population with one child or no children due to unaffordability of education forget about jobs which r reserved Soon reservation will touch 100./. In d country Where merits hs no place at all 50./. Limit by Supreme Court is violated & meritorious amongst d reservationists r snatching general quota seats too so It is Best of both d worlds

We must completely abolish this system of concession atleast for marks. You may give them free education but we must evaluate all the application at equal merit basis. such kids after getting into admitted with low score, get stuck and many of them drop out. this system was created only for 60 years as per constitution, now we have crossed this timeline and we must stop this. and give scholarship to the deserving under privileged students. many SC/ST people are so rich and having crores of property, but still get the fee relaxation, no one looks into all this.
